text: Soul Train is an American musical variety television show. After airing locally on WCIU-TV in Chicago, Illinois, for a year, it aired in syndication from October 2, 1971, to March 25, 2006. In its 35-year history, the show primarily featured performances by R&B;, soul, and hip hop artists. It was created by Don Cornelius, who also served as its first and longest-serving host and executive producer. title: Soul Train
